Title: Oshiri no Yama wa Everest
Description: ["The second music video for NHK's Minna no Uta program to feature UrumaDelvi's original butt-biting bug, five years after the original song was broadcast. We follow Oshiri Kajiri Mushi XVIII as he climbs Mount Everest in search of a legendary golden butt, yodelling all the way to the top."]
Related: ['Prequel: Instant History', 'Sequel: Monoshiri Daigaku: Ashita no Calendar']
Staff: [['UrumaDelvi', 'Theme Song Lyrics, Original Creator'], ['Matsumae, Kimitaka', 'Theme Song Composition']]
